Name: cooling energy, from natural gas, at cogen unit with absorption chiller 100kW | cooling energy | EN15804GD, U
Category: D:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/35:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/353:Steam and air conditioning supply/3530:Steam and air conditioning supply
Description: Single stage absorption chiller with 100 kW cooling capacity connected to a 250 kW hybrid air cooler. Seasonal performance factor (SPF) of 0.6. Supply temperature of the chilled water 6°C. Operated with heat of a temperature of 85- 100°C.
